channel.title: Need help
channel.description: ok so i run my client on local host to just see if theres any glitchs but when i send my source over to my vps and run it it dosnt work i changed the ips in client.java and gui.java on the client side and it dosnt work i recently hosted a server on my vos so ik its not the vps its the client if anyone can help that would be great pm me if u can
